product_description: Modern slim straight-leg jeans styled to look great in any setting sport a dusky grey wash burnished with light fading at the puckers and wear points.
product_details_and_care:
Modern slim straight-leg jeans styled to look great in any setting sport a dusky grey wash burnished with light fading at the puckers and wear points. Innovative TRANSCEND denim provides a soft, breathable fit and excellent shape recovery after every wear.
33" inseam; 14" leg opening; 10" front rise
Zip fly with button closure
Five-pocket style
52% rayon, 26% cotton, 21% polyester, 1% spandex
Machine wash, line dry
Made in the USA
Men's Clothing
Item #6107970
product_size_info:
True to size.
Slim but comfortable through seat and thigh.
Tapers slightly below the knee for a narrower leg opening.
